SubjectOrder Appointing the Auditor General of Canada as the Auditor of The Jacques-Cartier and Champlain Bridges Inc. (2021-2022)
PrecisOrder appointing the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as the AUDITOR of the JACQUES-CARTIER AND CHAMPLAIN BRIDGES INC. for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2022.
